name: Backspace
description:
WASD, arrow keys, or a combo of those and space to move. Double Jump implimented. All other bugs addressed from Game Jam! :) ENJOY!

Note: game is restricted to run only in 16:9 because science. So those of you with 4:3 monitors, enjoy the windowed game/black bars. Oh, and go buy a new monitor. Or don't, what's the point. *bleeeeggghhhh*
